children.name: am
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that [Zeezrom] began to cry unto the people, saying: Behold, I am guilty, and these men are spotless before God.

children.name: Amulek
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: answer
children.sourceText: And this Zeezrom began to question Amulek, saying: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: are
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: ask
children.sourceText: And this Zeezrom began to question Amulek, saying: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: authority
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people---as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: being
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: believe
children.sourceText: And [Zeezrom] answered and said: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: brought
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: command
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people---as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: dead
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: deny
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: does
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: existence
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: father
children.sourceText: Now Zeezrom saith again unto him: Is the Son of God the very Eternal Father?

children.name: give
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: God
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said unto him: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: had
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people---as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: hast
children.sourceText: And [Zeezrom] answered and said: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: hath
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: is
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said unto him: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: judged
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: knowest
children.sourceText: Now Zeezrom said unto him again: How knowest thou these things?

children.name: living
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said unto him: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: mean
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: men
children.sourceText: And it came to pass that [Zeezrom] began to cry unto the people, saying: Behold, I am guilty, and these men are spotless before God.

children.name: onties
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: people
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said again: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: put
children.sourceText: Now Zeezrom was a man who was expert in the devices of the devil, that he might destroy that which was good; therefore, he said unto Amulek: Will ye answer the questions which I shall put unto you?

children.name: questions
children.sourceText: And this Zeezrom began to question Amulek, saying: Will ye answer me a few questions which I shall ask you?

children.name: remember
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people---as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: resurrection
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: rise
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: said
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people---as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: saith
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people---as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: sayest
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said unto him: Thou sayest there is a true and living God?

children.name: see
children.sourceText: See that ye remember these things; for he said there is but one God; yet he saith that the Son of God shall come, but he shall not save his people---as though he had authority to command God.

children.name: silver
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: sins
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said again: Shall he save his people in their sins?

children.name: son
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said again: Who is he that shall come? Is it the Son of God?

children.name: spoken
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: stand
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: taught
children.sourceText: And [Zeezrom] answered and said: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: things
children.sourceText: Now Zeezrom said unto him again: How knowest thou these things?

children.name: wilt
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: words
children.sourceText: And [Zeezrom] answered and said: Yea, I believe all the words that thou hast taught.

children.name: works
children.sourceText: What does this mean which Amulek hath spoken concerning the resurrection of the dead, that all shall rise from the dead, both the just and the unjust, and are brought to stand before God to be judged according to their works?

children.name: behold
children.sourceText: Behold, here are six onties of silver, and all these will I give thee if thou wilt deny the existence of a Supreme Being.

children.name: come
children.sourceText: And Zeezrom said again: Who is he that shall come? Is it the Son of God?
